title: Looking for softfare fonts mac 10.4.11
content:
Hello  
I am desperately trying to find a software able to generate the fonts I create with Illustrator. I am working on a PPC Mac 10.4.11, that is the hot point. I have been searching by myself but have not yet found anything.  
Do you know what soft in which version would suit my old mac ? Free if possible...
author: helor

comments.content:
Free PPC font creation software: I think your only choice will be FontForge. There are some older versions with 10.4 PPC builds already in existence, which would be easier than building it yourself from source:  
 [http://mac.softpedia.com/get/Font-Tools/FontForge.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420025100/http:/mac.softpedia.com/get/Font-Tools/FontForge.shtml)

Thanks for your answer. Unfortunately, I have tryed FontForge, but impossible to make it run. It seems that a lot of people have had same kind of problems. My english is probably not good enough to understand the technical answers that have been made on the web. Anyway, FF seems to be quite difficult to tame on a 10.4.11.  
Having post on an another forum, I have had the suggestion to swift to 10.5 and use Glyphs. So I have downloaded 10.5.6 on Softonic. I will clean and back up my PPC before installing and trying Glyphs...
